definition: axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.chinese: 曲轴箱把曲轴装置于内。
曲轴箱把曲轴装置于内。

sentences.english: As a result, it can decrease production routine and reduce production costs, which will lay foundations for practical research on parts such as crank axle.
sentences.chinese: 本研究为曲轴等非调质钢零件的实用性研究提供参考。

sentences.english: Remove chain drive wheel from crankshaft.
sentences.chinese: 从曲轴上拆下链条驱动轮。
曲轴箱连杆密封件损坏。

sentences.english: When I now want to make more wax rear intake crankcases I have some work.
sentences.chinese: 当我现在要多作蜡后方进气曲轴箱，我有一些工作。

sentences.english: Aligning main engine's crank shaft and intermediate shaft after launching.
sentences.chinese: 下水后主机曲轴和中间轴连接后校中。

sentences.english: I say this because later when I machine the crankcases I take some away.
sentences.chinese: 我这样说是因为后来当我机曲轴箱我的一些离开。

sentences.english: CKP sensor rotor plate is fitted to crankshaft counterweight No. 1 by pin and screws.
sentences.chinese: 转子板的CKP传感器安装在曲轴销和螺钉重第一。

sentences.english: It is interlocked with the crankshaft via the chain drive .
sentences.chinese: 它通过链条驱动机构与曲轴互锁在一起。

sentences.english: The flywheel is a relatively heavy metal wheel, which is firmly attached to the crankshaft.
sentences.chinese: 飞轮是一个相当重的金属轮盘，飞轮与曲轴紧相连。

sentences.english: Superior dispersiveness has reduced the forming of the crankcase oil sludge greatly.
sentences.chinese: 优越的分散性大大降低了曲轴箱油泥的形成。

sentences.english: Finally, the measures to reduce the radial circle run-out error of the crankshaft main journal have be presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了减小曲轴主轴颈径向圆跳动误差的措施。

sentences.english: The oil pump is driven by a chain drive on the crankshaft.
sentences.chinese: 机油泵由曲轴上的链条驱动装置来驱动。

sentences.english: Two site repairing methods for Type-300 diesel engine after burning of bearing liner for crank shaft are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍300型柴油机曲轴烧瓦后的两种现场修复法。

sentences.english: The development process and result of the ADI crankshaft for a turbocharged 6 cylinders diesel engine was described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍六缸增压柴油机等淬球铁曲轴的试制过程及结果。

definition: cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
